text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews You make a joke of Coronavirus! Seriously? People are dying and you joke. You are no leader. It is YOU, tRump, who is the Joke. You should be Impeached again, because of the ,120,000+ Americans who have died because you failed to act!! You are a Hateful man!  IMPEACHED FOREVER!!
